query:
INSERT INTO courses (
  title,
  description,
  level,
  framework,
  duration,
  region_id,
  price_one_time,
  price_3_month,
  price_6_month,
  price_12_month,
  stripe_price_id_one_time,
  stripe_price_id_3_month,
  stripe_price_id_6_month,
  stripe_price_id_12_month,
  modules,
  learning_objectives,
  prerequisites,
  target_audience,
  certification_name,
  is_active
) VALUES (
  'NIST AI RMF Fundamentals',
  'Master the NIST AI Risk Management Framework with comprehensive training on the four core functions (Govern, Map, Measure, Manage) and seven trustworthy AI characteristics. Learn to build trustworthy AI systems through structured risk management.',
  'fundamentals',
  'NIST AI RMF',
  '20 hours',
  1,
  49900,
  19900,
  9900,
  5900,
  'price_1SiBVsDuEg5HakgPl2cnJPC0',
  'price_1SiBVsDuEg5HakgPBbZOgee2',
  'price_1SiBVsDuEg5HakgPt1H4qz4H',
  'price_1SiBVsDuEg5HakgP9AreWlme',
  JSON_ARRAY(
    'Introduction to NIST AI RMF',
    'Trustworthy AI Characteristics',
    'GOVERN Function',
    'MAP Function',
    'MEASURE Function',
    'MANAGE Function',
    'AI Lifecycle and Actors',
    'Implementation Roadmap and Best Practices'
  ),
  JSON_ARRAY(
    'Explain the purpose and structure of the NIST AI Risk Management Framework',
    'Identify and describe the seven characteristics of trustworthy AI systems',
    'Understand the four core functions: Govern, Map, Measure, and Manage',
    'Recognize AI risks and their potential impacts on individuals, organizations, and society',
    'Apply basic risk management concepts to AI systems',
    'Describe the roles and responsibilities of AI actors across the lifecycle',
    'Implement foundational risk management practices for AI systems'
  ),
  'Basic understanding of AI/ML concepts (recommended but not required)',
  'AI practitioners, compliance officers, risk managers, product managers, anyone new to AI risk management',
  'CSOAI Certified NIST AI RMF Fundamentals',
  1
);
